betterquesting.name: The Beginning of the End
betterquesting.desc:
This is the beginning of the end for this era. To proceed, check the checkbox. (I agree).

Does anyone ever read software EULAs on Installation Wizards? Whatever, just check the box and I'll give you some starter food.

betterquesting.name: You Know What to Do!
betterquesting.desc: Punch Trees. You already knew that though. But, there's a catch, which we'll see if you can figure out.

betterquesting.name: Tool Tables
betterquesting.desc: You may have noticed that vanilla tools are useless! well, this is supposed to be a challenge.

betterquesting.name: Flint Tools
betterquesting.desc: Now that you have your tables, you can get a few basic tools.

betterquesting.name: First Automation
betterquesting.desc:
Automation is a key component of this pack. Let's start with an Auto-Workbench from Buildcraft. Hoppers are also cheaper, so let's use those. Oh wait, you need a furnace? Then let's get mining!

The auto-workbench works by putting in a recipe template, then inserting items, in this case by hopper. Therefore, I recommend several auto-workbenches, one for each common recipe.

betterquesting.name: Smelting
betterquesting.desc: Your flint tools gain wear and tear, and with it, better abilities, but it has become time to upgrade; to harness Lava's hidden power to melt ores into liquid for better tools. In simpler terms, make a smeltery.

betterquesting.name: Coke Oven
betterquesting.desc:
What's this? No charcoal from smelting logs? Well, you know what this means.

Coke bricks are 144 mB of seared stone (4 grout in a smeltery) over one sandy brick block.

betterquesting.name: Steel Production
betterquesting.desc: As you activate your coke oven, you realize that you are missing one thing to advance, only the most industrial metal. It's time for steel.

betterquesting.name: We Need to Go Deeper!
betterquesting.desc: Now you have the materials to go deeper, to the depths of, well, the other place... So build that 4*5 and begin your inter-dimensional journey!

betterquesting.name: New World, New Challenge
betterquesting.desc: Welcome to your new world, crafter. This era has come to an end, with most others leaving for the new realm of 1.10.2. Only you remain. If you are playing on Normal Mode, this book will be of little use. If you want a challenge however, type /ftb_mode set challenge and follow this book. Good Luck!
